column4:
気をぬくなよ
セーラーヴィーナス
わかってる、やつらのことだわ……そろそろ
column6: Got it. Knowing that bunch, one of them must be―
column8: Got it. Knowing them, one of them must be―

column4:
ええ？
セーラーヴィーナス
ノコノコ姿を見せるころだと思ったのよ！！
column6: I knew you'd show your face sooner or later!
column8: I knew you'd show your face sooner or later!

column4:
おりてらっしゃい！
……それとも
column6:
What are you waiting for?
Come down! Unless...
column8:
What are you waiting for?
Come down! Unless...

column4: あたしがコワくておりられないのかしら？
column6: You're too scared to face me up close?
column8: You're too scared to face me up close?

column4: あなたたち、今度はなにをたくらんでるの！
column6: What are you guys plotting? Tell me!
column8: What are you guys plotting? Tell me!

column4:
……それを知りたければ
オレを倒してみるんだな
column6: If you want to know...you'll have to defeat me first.
column8: If you want to know...you'll have to defeat me first.

column4:
あなたの正体は
とっくにお見通しよ！
column6: I know exactly who you are!
column8: I know exactly who you are!

column4:
四天王の１人
クンツァイト！！
column6: You're one of the +Shitennou+Four Heavenly Kings+―Kunzite!

column4:
いかにも、オレの名は
ダークキングダム四天王

column6: I am Kunzite, one of the Dark Kingdom's +Shitennou+Four Heavenly Kings+.
column8: I am Kunzite, one of the Dark Kingdom's Shitennou.

column4:
セーラーヴィーナス
きさまにこのオレの相手が
どこまでつとまるかな？
column6: Let's see how long you can keep up with me.
column8: Let's see how long you can keep up with me.

column6: Don't get too full of yourself!
column8: Don't get too full of yourself!

column4: （クレッセン……ダメ！まにあわない！！）
他人の心配をするヒマが…

column6: You shouldn't have pushed your luck, girl.
column8: You shouldn't have pushed your luck, girl.

column4: きさまなど、このおれの敵ではない！
column6: You were never a match for me!
column8: You were never a match for me!

column4:
（く……苦しい……
なんとか……しなきゃ…）
（こ……このままじゃ……やられちゃう……）
おうじょうぎわが悪いぞ
column6: You don't know when to give up, do you?
column8: You don't know when to give up, do you?

column4:
……あんずるな
おまえの仲間も
今ごろ同じ運命をたどっているころだろう……
column6: Soon, you and your little friends will all be together...
column8: You and your little friends will all be together, soon...

column4: （だめ……このままじゃ…うさぎちゃん……）

column6: Get your dirty hands off of her!!
column8: Get your dirty hands off of her!!

column4:
今だ！
セーラーヴィーナス！
おのれ…よくもこのオレさまに、土をつけてくれたな
column6:
How dare you...
How dare you get me dirty?!
column8:
How dare you...
How dare you get me dirty?!

column4:
どうした
セーラーヴィーナス
おまえの力はそんなものか
column6: Is that the best you can do?
column8: Is that the best you can do?

column4:
いい顔だ……
苦痛にのたうつ人間は
column6:
Ah, yes...
What a lovely expression.
column8:
Ah, yes...
What a lovely expression.

column4: 実に魅惑にみちた表情を見せてくれる
column6: There is nothing I find more charming than the face of a mortal writhing in pain.
column8: There is nothing I find more charming than the face of a mortal, writhing in pain.

column4: オレが断ち切ってやろう！！
column6: ...is the last thing you'll ever experience!
column8: is the last thing you'll ever experience!

column4: （チャンス！　今なら……勝てる！）
column6: (This is it! I can win now!)
column8: (This is it! I can win now!)

column4: おのれ……よくもやってくれたな……
column6: Curse you...! How dare you do this to me...?!
column8: Curse you...! How dare you do this to me...?!

column4: これ以上の戦いは無意味よ　あきらめなさい！
column6:
There's no point in fighting any longer!
Surrender now!
column8:
There's no point in fighting any longer!
Surrender now!
